skills.name: Short Fuse
skills.speed: {{tt|1500|Attack missile speed, same as basic attacks}}
skills.blurb: Every 12 seconds, Ziggs' next basic attack deals bonus magic damage. This cooldown is reduced whenever Ziggs uses an ability.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Periodically, '''Ziggs' ''' next [[basic attack]] deals {{as|{{pp|20;24;28;32;36;40;48;56;64;72;80;88;100;112;124;136;148;160|formula = 16 + 4 per level up to 6, then + 8 per level up to 12, and then + 12 per level up to 18}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}},{{ft|increased by 150% against [[structures]].|increased to {{as|{{pp|50;60;70;80;90;100;120;140;160;180;200;220;250;280;310;340;370;400|formula = 40 + 10 per level up to 6, then + 20 per level up to 12, and then + 30 per level up to 18}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 125% AP)}} against [[structures]].}}
''Short Fuse's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by {{pp|4 to 6 for 3|1 to 13}} seconds whenever '''Ziggs''' casts an [[Champion ability|ability]].
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Periodically, Ziggs' next basic attack deals 20;24;28;32;36;40;48;56;64;72;80;88;100;112;124;136;148;160undefined − (based on level) (+ 50% AP) bonus magic damage,
Short Fuse's cooldown is reduced by 1 to 13 ‒ undefined seconds whenever Ziggs casts an Champion ability.
skills.notes: * {{Pending for test}}: ''Short Fuse's'' interactions with {{tip|dodge|dodging}}, {{tip|block|blocking}}, and {{tip|blind|blinding}} effects.

skills.name: Bouncing Bomb
skills.range: {{tt|1400|Maximum range with bounces, excluding explosion radius}}
skills.speed: {{tt|1700|Initial missile}} / {{tt|Fixed time|Bounces travel over 0.495 seconds each, regardless of distance}}
skills.blurb: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ziggs''' throws a bouncing bomb at the target location, which explodes upon landing near an enemy, landing within terrain, or reaching its final bounce. The bomb can bounce up to two times, the distance traveled each time based on how far it was originally thrown.
The bomb's explosion deals {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies.
''Bouncing Bomb'' will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb at the target location, which explodes upon landing near an enemy, landing within terrain, or reaching its final bounce. The bomb can bounce up to two times, the distance traveled each time based on how far it was originally thrown.
The bomb's explosion deals magic damage to all nearby enemies.
Bouncing Bomb will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
skills.notes:
* ''Bouncing Bomb'' can be thrown or bounce over units/terrain.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage of the explosion, but the explosion can still damage other targets in the radius.
* '''Ziggs''' will throw the bomb from his location at the end of the cast time, towards the {{tt|pre-clamped|Relevant only if cast beyond maximum range}} cast location, causing the bounces to adjust their angle accordingly.

skills.name: Satchel Charge
skills.blurb: Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after 4 seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage. Ziggs can use the Satchel to hexplode vulnerable enemy turrets.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ziggs''' hurls an explosive charge at the target location for 4 seconds, which grants {{tip|sight}} of the area and explodes after the duration. ''Satchel Charge'' can be recast at any time while it is in flight or within its duration, and does so automatically after its duration ends.

Upon exploding, all enemies within the area are dealt {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|airborne|knocked back}} up-to 500 units away from the center of the charge. If '''Ziggs''' is within the explosion, he {{tip|dash|dashes}} up to 825 units away from the center of the charge.

{{Cci|Satchel Charge Turret Explosion Indicator.png|border=false||{{sbc|Turret Explosion:}}}} The explosion also {{ccs|{{tip|execute|executes}}|magic}} enemy {{tip|turrets}} within the area and below a {{sti|health|{{as|'''percentile''' health}}}} threshold.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Ziggs''' detonates ''Satchel Charge''. If ''Satchel Charge'' was recast while in flight, it will detonate immediately upon landing.
'''Ziggs''' does not {{tip|dash}} if he is {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} or {{tip|ground|grounded}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ziggs hurls an explosive charge at the target location for 4 seconds, which grants sight of the area and explodes after the duration. Satchel Charge can be recast at any time while it is in flight or within its duration, and does so automatically after its duration ends.
Upon exploding, all enemies within the area are dealt magic damage and knocked back up-to 500 units away from the center of the charge. If Ziggs is within the explosion, he dashes up to 825 units away from the center of the charge.
Turret Explosion:">Unknown value: Cci / Satchel Charge Turret Explosion Indicator.png / border=false / / Turret Explosion: The explosion also executes / magic">Unknown value: ccs / executes / magic enemy turrets within the area and below a percentile health threshold.
Recast: Ziggs detonates Satchel Charge. If Satchel Charge was recast while in flight, it will detonate immediately upon landing.
Ziggs does not dash if he is immobilized or grounded.
skills.notes:
*The initial cast counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
**Detonating the ability manually does not.
* Deals {{tip|area damage}} to non-turrets and {{tip|raw damage}} to turrets.
* ''Satchel Charge's'' distance increases with proximity to the charge, resulting in being knocked straight up when aligned directly on top of it.
* '''Ziggs''' will not ''dash'' from ''Satchel Charge's'' detonation while {{si|Teleport|Teleporting}} but he will while {{si|Recall|Recalling}}.

effects.str: • Demolition Threshold: % of turret's maximum health

skills.name: Hexplosive Minefield
skills.effect_radius: {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} {{tt|325|Effective minefield radius}} / {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} {{tt|135|Detection and explosion radius of each individual mine}}
skills.blurb: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing magic damage and slowing.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ziggs''' scatters a cluster of 11 proximity mines over the target location, {{tt|arming after {{fd|0.5}} seconds|travel time of the mines spreading out plus a brief delay}} and lasting for up to 10 seconds.

Each mine within the area explodes upon contact with an enemy, dealing them {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. Enemies can detonate multiple mines but mines beyond the first only deal 40% damage to them.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ziggs scatters a cluster of 11 proximity mines over the target location, arming after 0.5 seconds and lasting for up to 10 seconds.
Each mine within the area explodes upon contact with an enemy, dealing them magic damage and slowing them for 1.5 seconds. Enemies can detonate multiple mines but mines beyond the first only deal 40% damage to them.
leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage per Mine|{{ap|40 to 180}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Reduced Damage per Mine|{{ap|40*0.4 to 180*0.4}} {{as|(+ {{ap|30*0.4}}% AP)}}|Maximum Single-Target Damage|{{ap|40*(1+0.4*10) to 180*(1+0.4*10)}} {{as|(+ 150% AP)}}}}
{{st|Slow|{{ap|30 to 50}}%}}
skills.notes:
* The mine cluster is built of 2 rings, with 3 mines in the inner ring (radius pending for test) and 8 mines on the other ring (200 radius), all equally spaced.
** The angular offset is randomized on each cast.
** Because of the {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 135 detonation radius of each mine, the total possible range of a mine from the minefield hitting an enemy from the cast location is {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 335 units. It will often be slightly less as the minefield is not guaranteed to be angled the right way for this.
* ''Hexplosive Minefield'' grants {{tip|sight}} of the target area for a short duration (on-cast and when each mine explodes).
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the effects of a single detonation.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage per Mine: (+ 30% AP)
  • Reduced Damage per Mine: (+ % AP)
  • Maximum Single-Target Damage: (+ 150% AP)
  • Slow: %

skills.name: Mega Inferno Bomb
skills.blurb: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take more damage than those farther away.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ziggs''' hurls a massive bomb at the target location, granting {{tip|sight}} within a 600 radius around its destination for 4 seconds and sight in a <!--350 -->radius around the missile as it travels to its destination.
Upon reaching the location, it explodes, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within the area, increased by 50% against those in the epicenter.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ziggs hurls a massive bomb at the target location, granting sight within a 600 radius around its destination for 4 seconds and sight in a radius around the missile as it travels to its destination.
Upon reaching the location, it explodes, dealing magic damage to all enemies within the area, increased by 50% against those in the epicenter.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|200 to 400}} {{as|(+ {{fd|73.3{{Recurring|3}}}}% AP)}}|Increased Damage|{{ap|200*1.5 to 400*1.5}} {{as|(+ 110% AP)}}}}
skills.notes:
* Allies cannot see ''Mega Inferno Bomb's'' area indicator until shortly before the blast.
* ''Mega Inferno Bomb'' takes {{fd|2.64}} seconds from the start of the cast time to land when ''Ziggs'' casts at maximum range (reduced to {{fd|1.617}} seconds from the start of the cast time when casting within {{tt|2700|Estimated}} units).
** When cast within 2700 units, ''Mega Inferno Bomb'' has a fixed travel time. Beyond that, the travel time is equal to the cast distance divided by the now-fixed missile speed.
* The area reveal on the target location begins as soon as the cast time is completed and can see into {{tip|brush}} and across terrain.
* The missile's sight radius cannot see into {{tip|brush}} or across terrain, and due to the intervals in which it is checked, may not see into brush entirely even if it travels straight across it.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 73.3Unknown value: Recurring / 3% AP)
  • Increased Damage: (+ 110% AP)

st_slices: (+ 73.3Unknown value: Recurring / 3% AP)
